messages.content: What types of files does ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save support for loading and saving?
ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save supports loading and saving of EXR files individually or in batches, and for saving RGB or RGBA 32bpc EXR and 16bpc RGB TIFF files.
How can the output folder path be formatted when saving EXR files?
When saving EXR files with ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save, the output folder path can be formatted as relative paths within the output folder or as absolute paths with version and frame number formatting.
What CLI argument is recommended for more accurate decoding?
The recommended CLI argument for more accurate decoding when using ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save is `--fp32-vae`.
How does the number of possible values per channel compare between PNG and TIFF files?
PNG files have 256 possible values per channel (2^8), while TIFF files have 65,536 possible values per channel (2^16).
What is the formula for approximating RGB values from the four latent channels?
What are the known issues with ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save?
There are two known issues with ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save: No workflow metadata is saved to the TIFF or EXR images and there is no load TIFF node yet.
